channel.title: General on Doug's Dabblings | Quick thoughts on stuff I'm playing with
channel.description: Recent content in General on Doug's Dabblings | Quick thoughts on stuff I'm playing with

item.title: The continuing adventures of Mom cutting the cord
item.description: As a belated update to this post, Mom has told DirecTV to completely go screw and she’s moved over to Philo where she’s currently loving life.

item.title: Mom cuts the cord
item.description: OK folks, it finally happened. My mother has cut the cord and now gets all her TV needs satisfied via OTA and OTT.

item.title: Car(e) free in Columbus
item.description: Last year, at the beginning of March, I turned in my 2014 Kia Optima LX at the end of its lease and decided to go ‘car free’.

item.title: Goodbye, Loui boy
item.description: Thank you, Loui, for bringing so much joy and happiness to our lives these past ten years.

item.title: Welcome to Cypheri
item.description: I recently discovered the online game NationStates thanks to a Reddit thread and was intrigued.

item.title: Functional Blog Archives
item.description: After an afternoon dicking around with Jekyll templates and Google searching, I’ve fixed up this site’s archive pages and tag cloud pages.

item.title: Making use of gists
item.description: After stumbling upon an example of how to do so, I’ve converted all my existing blog posts to use GitHub Gists instead of inline code blocks.

item.title: Hello, eero
item.description: I don’t normally back things on Indiegogo (I’m a Kickstarter snob), but I jumped all over the eero.

item.title: Flyover State
item.description: Being a native of Ohio, I can assure you that I’ve heard every form of ‘flyover state’ insult you could care to level at me.

item.title: Efficient, yet Creepy
item.description: So I’m sitting here seting up a new Internet connected device I bought recently (more on it later) and I can’t seem to get it to setup properly.
